titleStmt.title: The tryal and condemnation of Edw. Fitz-Harris, Esq., for high treason at the barr of the Court of King's Bench, at Westminster, on Thursday the 9th of June, in Trinity term, 1681 : as also the tryal and condemnation of Dr. Oliver Plunket, titular primate of Ireland, for high treason ...
titleStmt.author: Fitzharris, Edward, 1648?-1681.
England and Wales. Court of King's Bench.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Francis Tyton and Thomas Basset ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
